home.title: Founding Engineer
home.description: Founding Engineer previously at Clarum, a Y Combinator-backed fintech startup, with prior experience at Deloitte, I’m passionate about creating innovative solutions to tackle real-world challenges. Originally from Montreal and now based in San Francisco, I enjoy staying active through rock climbing, running, and yoga, as well as exploring great food and connecting with others. Let’s connect!

spendo-budget.title: Spendo Budget
spendo-budget.description: An AI-powered budgeting app that connects to your bank accounts to automatically categorize spending and build personalized budgets. It provides real-time insights, trend tracking, and monthly reports to help you stay on top of your finances effortlessly.

claycon.title: claycon.app
claycon.description: A simple AI tool that generates high-quality, 3D-style icons from text prompts. It’s built for designers and developers who need fast, consistent, and customizable icons for their projects.

mesmaxillos.title: MesMaxillos
mesmaxillos.description: Designed and launched a professional-grade website for a maxillofacial surgery clinic, enhancing its online presence and making it easier for patients to access essential information and services.

how-to-build-web-apps-fast.title: How to build web apps fast
how-to-build-web-apps-fast.description: Learn the modern web development stack that leverages AI for rapid application building. Complete guide to Next.js, Drizzle ORM, shadcn/ui, and deployment best practices for 2025.

recreating-vercels-book-component.title: Recreating Vercel's Book Component
recreating-vercels-book-component.description: Lessons on how I recreated Vercel's book component using React and Tailwind CSS.
